H0.text: An Adder's Mouth is what type of plant. Fern

H1.text: An Adder's Mouth is what type of plant. Snapdragon

H2.text: An Adder's Mouth is what type of plant. Violet

H3.text: An Adder's Mouth is what type of plant. Orchid

A4.text: Paphiopedilum, often called the Venus slipper, is a genus of the lady slipper orchid subfamily Cypripedioideae of the flowering plant family Orchidaceae.

A5.text: Paphiopedilum is a genus of the lady slipper orchid subfamily Cypripedioideae, not a fern.
